programme.title: The $100,000 Pyramid S6
programme.desc: Two teams of two compete in a word-association game. Each contestant gets a celebrity partner, and one partner provides clues to the other about six mystery words, leaving the other to guess those words before the time runs out. The team with the most points gets to play in the winners circle, where the top prize is $100,000. Michael Strahan hosts.

programme.title: Wipeout USA S8
programme.desc: Follows the three rounds and three-stage, obstacle course consisting of multiple strategy and decision points designed to further challenge, and wear out, the stamina of the competitors. Hosted by John Cena, Nicole Byer, and Camille Kostek.

programme.title: Crime Scene Kitchen S1
programme.desc: A culinary guessing game in which bakers must decode what type of dessert using just crumbs and a few elusive clues. They have to recreate the recipe and the judges will determine how closely it matches the missing dessert.

programme.title: Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond The Lobby S1
programme.desc: In the third episode of this eye-opening series, Giles Coren and Monica Galetti discover Giraffe Manor, a unique hotel where giraffes, staff and guests all coexist in a 1930s Scottish-style hunting lodge on the edge of Nairobi National Park. It is the operational headquarters of Tanya and Mikey Carr-Hartley, fourth-generation Kenyans who also own three satellite luxury lodges and camps throughout Kenya and east Africa's wilderness.

programme.desc: The episode starts with Helly's Dal Dhokli, a traditional Gujarati dish made with lentils as the base for the curry and the dhokli is made with wheat flour making it a wholesome dish. programme.title: Field Trip With Curtis Stone S2
programme.desc: Curtis heads to Maui to explore the local cuisine. He starts with a visit to a taro root farm to process their staple food, Poi. Diving into the culture, Curtis journey's through the forest with local hunters to hunt wild boar which are considered invasive species to the Hawaiian Islands. Curtis sets out to sea with famed chef, Isaac Bancanco, to make Lau Laus. And Curtis can't resist a trip to the beach where he meets some local surfers and lunches on their favorite grinds, Ulua Lau Laus.

programme.desc: (PG) 这一集，民雄将带着世界羽球球后戴资颖，以及她的冠军教练团一起快乐游茂林啰～这趟旅行的第一天，他们将到访两台湾唯一三星级生态景观“茂林紫蝶幽谷”寻找四种紫斑蝶，冲进得恩谷的天然划水道享受炎夏的清凉！再跟着当地专家夜探自然生态！ (听说小戴发现台湾斑龟) 。第二天再去认识台湾唯一国定万山岩雕遗址，走访东南亚最高的吊桥看周边大自然美景，并热热闹闹的大逛多纳市集，吃遍茂林区的美食小吃！除了这些，还有小戴及教练群们温暖的对话，以及被民雄大哥逗到笑歪了的笑容！.

programme.title: 放下
programme.desc: Tony今年43岁，目前的职业是救护车司机，共有3段婚姻。他自小在复杂环境中长大，爸爸混黑社会、妈妈爱钱如命，他深受双亲影响，求胜心强及很爱钱。他中学时期开始收保护费，然后又吸大麻和冰毒，渐渐也开始贩毒,为了赚更多钱，他的生活从此离不开毒品，赌博，女人和非法勾当，20几岁就因吸毒而被捉，而且连第一段婚姻也赔上，但他还不知悔改，出狱后继续贩毒赚钱，后来又再进出牢房，家人屡劝不听，最后才因为有了信仰而"放下"一切，踏踏实实地工作和生活，帮助还在毒海的人悔改，以及回馈社会，担任志工帮助独居老人。.

programme.title: 河我趣打卡
programme.desc: 湄公河流经的各国有着丰富的饮食文化、生活文化、习俗，而这些不被外人熟知的故事，便成就传奇的故事流传于民间。然而，这些有趣的传说、故事、习俗、都是旅人好奇的地方，主持人刘沛颖和TINA，充满勇气的展开大河之旅，她们将沿着湄公河，带着大家去旅行。.

programme.title: 植物野趣

programme.title: 第二任丈夫

programme.title: 第二任丈夫

programme.title: Oh! 三光公寓

programme.title: 天赐的声音 S4
programme.desc: (PG) 赛制不同于前三季。十二至十五位歌手被邀请成为音乐合伙人，自行两两配对演唱。若合伙人数量为单数，一位歌手将轮空。每轮演唱后，声音鉴赏团选出待定金曲。最终获推荐金曲的搭档将成为下一期队长，率领本队三对歌手角逐金曲。第二阶段起，每期两百位观众将额外选出一首人气金曲。.
